channel.title: [ALLSTAR] Project Sagan -
channel.description:
Project Sagan
Hello guys, I'm currently working on an allstar-based project called 'Project Sagan'. Well, obviously, I am looking for some helpers. I am mainly searching for
[i]- 2 server-devs[/i] [b]And a client-dev[/b]
Once the project's ready to go online. (not sure if it ever will be ready, but we'll see.) I can get a vps. Then i'll also look for some web-developers and such.
Anyways,
what does the source include?
- A client class of 1MB (already lowered by 500KB). Still needs to get cleaned by a lot. - Redone magic, i'd say it's 70%. There are working projectiles, decent hit calc, but I still need to add NPC poisoning stat lowering, and spell GFX's. - Redone crafting - Redone firemaking - Redone herblore - Working prayers (except for headIcon prayer, melee, and magic.) I still need to find a fix. The method I tried in Npchandler caused disconnecting.. - A custom minigame. You can see it by watching the showoff page. Tho it is really outdated. I have added a lot since then. - Working castle wars - Working on duel arena (probably won't add staking since that will most likely bring a lot of dupes, and I probably won't have a clue on how to do so lol) - Much more to think of, i might edit this thread.
SOME PICS
[url=http://postimg.org/image/jmlx7x6i7/][img]http://s3.postimg.org/jmlx7x6i7/newpica2.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/lfdo6kp61/][img]http://s4.postimg.org/lfdo6kp61/newpica3.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/jqbpai4mv/][img]http://s23.postimg.org/jqbpai4mv/newpica4.jpg[/img][/url]
If you're interested. Please post something below.
What i'd like to know about you is, you previous work.
~Sertan

item.title: [ALLSTAR] Project Sagan -
item.dc:creator: @vincentvodb vincentvodb
item.description:
@vincentvodb wrote:

I could help you coding

item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

Project Sagan

Hello guys, I’m currently working on an allstar-based project called ‘Project Sagan’. Well, obviously, I am looking for some helpers. I am mainly searching for

- 2 server-devs
And a client-dev

Once the project’s ready to go online. (not sure if it ever will be ready, but we’ll see.) I can get a vps. Then i’ll also look for some web-developers and such.

Anyways,

what does the source include?

  • Redone magic, i’d say it’s 70%. There are working projectiles, decent hit calc, but I still need to add NPC poisoning stat lowering, and spell GFX’s.
  • Redone crafting

  • Redone herblore

  • A custom minigame. You can see it by watching the showoff page. Tho it is really outdated. I have added a lot since then.
  • Working castle wars
  • Working on duel arena (probably won’t add staking since that will most likely bring a lot of dupes, and I probably won’t have a clue on how to do so lol)
  • Much more to think of, i might edit this thread.
